Translations.Text: Musukkulumu oyo eyassa Kur’ani ku mudduwe eyawula wakati w'amazima n'obulimba alyoke abeere omutiisa eri ebitonde
Oyo (Katonda) bubwe yekka obufuzi bw'eggulu omusanvu n'ensi era teyeeteerawo mwana era talina amwegattako mu bufuzi era yatonda buli kintu naakikola olukola olukisaanira

Ate (abatakkiriza) bamuvaako ne beeteerawo ba katonda abalala abatalina kintu kyonna kye batonda so ng'ate bbo baatondebwa, era nga tebalina buyinza kwetuusaako kabi oba ekirungi, era tebalina buyinza ku kufa wadde ku bulamu wadde ku kuzuukira

Abaakaafuwala bagamba nti ebigambo (bya Muhammad) tebirina kye biri okugyako okuba nti bulimba bwe yagunjaawo, era abantu abalala ne bamuyamba ku bwo, olwo nno ne baba nga baleese okweyisa obubi n'okutemerera
Era ne bagamba nti (byayogera) nfumo z'abaasooka, yasaba ne zimuwandiikirwa olwo nno zimusomerwa enkya n'eggulo
Bagambe nti (Kur’ani) yagissa oyo amanyi ebyama byo mu ggulu omusanvu ne nsi, mazima yye (Katonda) bulijjo musonyiyi musaasizi
Era baagamba nti: ono mubaka wangeriki alya emmere naatambula mu butale!, singa Malayika yassibwa gyali naabeera mutiisa awamu naye (nga amuyambako)
Oba eby'obugagga nebissibwa gyali (okuva mu ggulu) oba abe nga alina e nnimiro mwalya. Era abeeyisa ne bagamba nti temulina gwe mugoberera okugyako omusajja omuloge
Laba engeri gye bakukubira ebifaananyi, olwo nno ne babula, n'olwekyo tebayinza kufuna kkubo libazza (ku mazima)
Musukkulumu oyo singa aba ayagadde yaalikuteereddewo ebirungi okusinga ebyo, (nga nabyo) g'emalimiro agakulukutiramu emigga era naakuteerawo embiri
Wabula (ekibaleetera obuzibu kwe kuba nti) balimbisa olunaku lw'enkomerero, ate nga twategekera abalimbisa olunaku lw'enkomerero omuliro Saira
(Omuliro ogwo) bwe gulibalaba okusinziira ewala baliwulira mu gwo okutokota n'okududuma
Bwe balisuulibwa mu gwo, nga buli omu asuulibwa mu kifo ekifunda nga balijjiddwa, olwo nno balikaaba yaaye
Baligambibwa nti temukaaba ‘yaaye’ mulundi gumu, mukaabe ‘yaaye’ emirundi mingi
Bagambe nti ekyo (eky'okuyingira omuliro) kye kirungi oba e jjana ey'olubeerera eyo eyalagaanyisibwa abatya Katonda, egenda kubeera mpeera gye bali era nga buddo
Muyo bagenda kufuna bye baagala baakubeeramu obugenderevu (ekyo) ku Mukama omulabiriziwo ndagaano erina okukuumwa obutiribiri
N'olunaku lwalibakungaanya n'ebyo bye basinza ne baleka Katonda alibagamba nti mmwe mwabuza abaddu bange abo oba be baabulwa ekkubo
Baligamba nti: wasukkuluma Mukama. Tekitugwanirangako kweteerawo bakuumi balala ne tukuvaako, wabula wabeeyagaza ne bakadde baabwe okutuusa lwe beerabira okutendereza ne baba abantu ab'okuzikirira
(Katonda alibagamba nti) mazima babalimbisizza ku ebyo bye mwogera temusobola kweggyako bibonerezo wadde okutaasibwa, oyo yenna eyeeyisa obubi mu mmwe tumukombesa ku bibonerezo ebikambwe

Era tetwatuma olubereberye lwo babaka okugyako nga mazima bbo baliira ddala emmere nga batambula ne mu butale, era netufuula abamu ku mmwe ekikemo eri abalala, abaffe munagumiikiriza, bulijjo Mukama omulabiriziwo alabira ddala
